column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Lovely low-lit old-school ambiance. Deep
column2: dark booths and ultra professional staff. I've been to Bavette's with gal pals
column7: and I always leave happy. I must have at least one lillet rose martini whenever I am there
column8: but their old-fashioned is not to be missed either! I like to order oysters
column9: the filet mignon (ask for the tomato with the 10oz.) and as many sides as the table can handle. Do not miss the elotes
column11: and creamed spinach. I'd say Bavette's is my go-to spot in the loop.
